mode.name: packages_needing_updates
mode.query: select snpc.server_id, snpc.errata_id, snpc.package_id from rhnServerNeededCache snpc, rhnpackage p where server_id = :server_id and p.id = package_id

mode.name: package_associated_to_errata_and_channel
mode.query: select EP.package_id from rhnErrataPackage EP inner join rhnChannelPackage CP on EP.package_id = CP.package_id where CP.channel_id = :channel_id and EP.errata_id = :errata_id

mode.name: new_packages
mode.query: select server_id, errata_id, package_id from rhnServerNeededView where server_id = :server_id

write-mode.name: delete_needed_package_cache
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnServerNeededCache WHERE server_id = :server_id AND errata_id = :errata_id AND package_id = :package_id

write-mode.name: delete_needed_package_cache_null_errata
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnServerNeededCache WHERE server_id = :server_id AND errata_id IS NULL AND package_id = :package_id

write-mode.name: insert_needed_errata_cache
write-mode.query: INSERT INTO rhnServerNeededCache (server_id, errata_id, package_id) VALUES (:server_id, :errata_id, :package_id)

write-mode.name: delete_needed_errata_cache
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnServerNeededCache WHERE server_id = :server_id AND errata_id = :errata_id

mode.name: count_servers_in_errata_cache_queue
mode.query: SELECT server_count as num_items FROM rhnOrgErrataCacheQueue WHERE org_id = :org_id AND processed = 0

mode.name: all_serverids_for_org
mode.query: SELECT id FROM rhnServer WHERE org_id = :org_id

write-mode.name: insert_needed_package_cache
write-mode.query: INSERT INTO rhnServerNeededCache (server_id, errata_id, package_id) VALUES (:server_id, :errata_id, :package_id)

write-mode.name: delete_needed_cache_by_channel
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnServerNeededCache EC WHERE EC.server_id in (SELECT server_id from rhnServerChannel SC where SC.channel_id = :channel_id)

write-mode.name: insert_needed_cache_by_channel
write-mode.query: INSERT INTO rhnServerNeededCache (server_id, package_id, errata_id) (SELECT DISTINCT SNV.server_id, SNV.package_id, SNV.errata_id FROM rhnServerNeededView SNV WHERE SNV.server_id in (select SC.server_id from rhnServerChannel SC where SC.channel_id = :channel_id ))

write-mode.name: delete_outdated_cache_entries_by_packages
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnServerNeededCache SNC2 where (SNC2.server_id, SNC2.package_id) in ( select /*+ RULE */ distinct SNC.server_id, SNC.package_id from rhnServerNeededCache SNC, rhnServerChannel SC, rhnPackage NEWP, rhnPackage OLDP, rhnPackageEvr NEW_EVR, rhnPackageEvr OLD_EVR, rhnServerPackageArchCompat SPAC, rhnServer S where SNC.server_id = SC.server_id AND S.id = SNC.server_id AND SC.channel_id = :channel_id AND NEWP.id in (%s) AND OLDP.id = SNC.package_id AND NEWP.name_id = OLDP.name_id AND NEWP.evr_id = NEW_EVR.id AND OLDP.evr_id = OLD_EVR.id AND spac.server_arch_id = s.server_arch_id AND OLD_EVR.evr < NEW_EVR.evr AND SNC.errata_id is null )

write-mode.name: insert_new_cache_entries_by_packages
write-mode.query:
INSERT INTO rhnServerNeededCache (server_id, errata_id, package_id) ( SELECT /*+ RULE */ DISTINCT S.id as server_id, NULL as errata_id, P.id as package_id FROM rhnPackage P, rhnServerPackageArchCompat SPAC, rhnPackageEVR P_EVR, rhnPackageEVR SP_EVR, rhnServerPackage SP, rhnServerChannel SC, rhnServer S
WHERE SC.channel_id = :channel_id AND SC.server_id = S.id AND p.id in (%s) AND p.package_arch_id = spac.package_arch_id AND spac.server_arch_id = s.server_arch_id AND SP_EVR.id = SP.evr_id AND P_EVR.id = P.evr_id AND SP.server_id = S.id AND SP.name_id = P.name_id AND SP.evr_id != P.evr_id AND SP_EVR.evr < P_EVR.evr AND SP_EVR.evr = (SELECT MAX(PE.evr) FROM rhnServerPackage SP2, rhnPackageEvr PE WHERE PE.id = SP2.evr_id AND SP2.server_id = SP.server_id AND SP2.name_id = SP.name_id))

write-mode.name: insert_new_cache_entries_by_errata
write-mode.query:
INSERT INTO rhnServerNeededCache (server_id, errata_id, package_id) ( SELECT /*+ RULE */ DISTINCT S.id as server_id, :errata_id as errata_id, P.id as package_id FROM rhnPackage P, rhnServerPackageArchCompat SPAC, rhnPackageEVR P_EVR, rhnPackageEVR SP_EVR, rhnServerPackage SP, rhnServerChannel SC, rhnServer S
WHERE SC.channel_id = :channel_id AND SC.server_id = S.id AND p.id in (%s) AND p.package_arch_id = spac.package_arch_id AND spac.server_arch_id = s.server_arch_id AND SP_EVR.id = SP.evr_id AND P_EVR.id = P.evr_id AND SP.server_id = S.id AND SP.name_id = P.name_id AND SP.evr_id != P.evr_id AND SP_EVR.evr < P_EVR.evr AND SP_EVR.evr = (SELECT MAX(PE.evr) FROM rhnServerPackage SP2, rhnPackageEvr PE WHERE PE.id = SP2.evr_id AND SP2.server_id = SP.server_id AND SP2.name_id = SP.name_id))

write-mode.name: delete_needed_cache_for_channel_packages
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnServerNeededCache SNC where (SNC.server_id, SNC.package_id) in (select SNC.server_id, SNC.package_Id from rhnServerChannel SC WHERE SC.channel_id = :channel_id AND SC.server_id = SNC.server_id AND SNC.package_id in (%s))

write-mode.name: delete_needed_cache_for_channel_errata
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnServerNeededCache SNC where (SNC.server_id, SNC.errata_id) in ( select SNC.server_id, SNC.errata_id from rhnServerChannel SC WHERE SC.channel_id = :channel_id AND SC.server_id = SNC.server_id AND SNC.errata_id in (%s))

write-mode.name: delete_needed_cache_for_errata_packages
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnServerNeededCache SNC where ( SNC.errata_id, SNC.package_id) in ( select SNC.server_id, SNC.package_id from rhnServerChannel SC where SNC.package_id in (%s) AND SNC.errata_id = :errata_id)
